data.text: @dust2087 @1570_landa Doesn’t matter if he’s an asshole or not. What matters is that she’s a liar and an abuser and she’s exploiting the #MeToo movement for her own gains and taking advantage of other people’s actual trauma.

@1570_landa “No thanks, I’d rather not watch a woman who was arrested in 2009 for hitting her then girlfriend in public & made false DV accusations against Johnny Depp & then later admitted to having abused him” X2

@1570_landa No thanks I’d rather not watch a woman who was arrested in 2009 for hitting her then girlfriend in public & made false DV accusations against Johnny Depp & then later admitted to having abused him.
@1570_landa I am so obsessed with WIlliam Dafoe. Like seriously. He is a fascinating actor, always has been.
@1570_landa It was pulled for copyright. Not Depp at all. Studio name war.
